headline: AvalonBay Communities, Inc. Named 2025 Regional Sector Leader by GRESB
summary: ARLINGTON, Va., November 04, 2025--AVALONBAY COMMUNITIES, INC. (NYSE: AVB) (the "Company") announced that it has been named the Regional Sector Leader for Americas Listed Residential in the 2025 GRESB Development Benchmark, earning a score of 95 out of 100. The annual GRESB Sector Leader Awards assess and benchmark the performance of real assets worldwide, delivering insights to financial markets on performance factors that influence long-term value.
